snippet.title: What is Legends of Runeterra? Explained | Intro Guide and Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Pre-register at https://playruneterra.com for a chance to play right now. In the League of Legends strategy card game, victory comes down to one question: what’s your move?

Join the community and see more: 
WEBSITE: www.playruneterra.com  
DISCORD: https://discord.gg/legendsofruneterra     
YOUTUBE: you are here
TWITCH: https://www.twitch.tv/riotgames  
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/legendsofruneterra/ 
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/playruneterra 
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/legendsofruneterra  

0:00 Intro
0:21 Champions and Leveling Up
1:00 Regions of Runeterra and Building Your Deck
2:00 Alternating Actions and Playing Units
3:10 Spells and Reactions
3:37 Oracle’s Eye and the Sequence
3:56 Earning Cards and More Rewards
4:19 Wildcards and Shards
4:37 The Vault
4:55 Expeditions and Ranked
